H0.text: Nucleic acids are defined by their sequence of nucleotides.

H1.text: Structural acids are defined by their sequence of nucleotides.

H2.text: Proteins acids are defined by their sequence of nucleotides.

H3.text: Amino acids are defined by their sequence of nucleotides.

A4.text: It is the sequence of these four nucleobases along the backbone that encodes genetic information.

A5.text: Nucleotide sequences are of great importance in biology since they carry the ultimate instructions that encode all biological molecules...
